body.name: iscream Seal and Send 40 Sheet Stationery Note Card Pad with Seals - Gamer Glitch
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 50 mins
features: Make it easy - and fun - for your child to stay in touch with friends and family with this seal and send stationery pack
Large 10.5" x 7.75" spiral bound, stationery pad includes 40 full-color sheets that are lined on one side and ready for writing
After writing a note, fold it and seal it with one of the included stickers
The perfect way to write a thank you note to a friend or tell grandma about summer camp
A colorful and fun way for your child to keep everyone only a mailbox away!
body.description: Make it easy - and fun - for your child to stay in touch with friends and family with this seal and send stationery pack! Spiral bound book includes 40 full-color sheets that are lined on one side and ready for writing. After writing a note, fold it and seal it with one of the included stickers. Now its ready to send! It's the perfect way to write a thank you note to a friend or tell grandma about the latest big game! Proudly made in the USA!At iscream we are obsessed about fun, function and style - see our whole line for new ideas and old favorites with a new twist!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for summer camp
reviews.reviewText: My son got this to write my daughter letters at camp. It is high-quality and thick paper. The stickers are fun, and I love that the theme matches personalities. Great brand and the stationary does not disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for pen pals!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my son to use to write to his own pal. He really likes it! I like not having to search for a separate envelope (they are never where they're supposed to be for some reason). This is so cute and easy to use! There is just enough room for a kid to write a message and some questions to their pen pal, and if they end up writing more, it would be easy enough to add another page.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids to send letters home from camp
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these for my son, so that he would have an 'all-inclusive' solution to sending letters home from summer camp. It provided a fun experience that he was happy (enough) to do it (we had previously tried plain paper/envelopes & he had refused). I wouldn't say that all of letters consisted of great quality writing (please send towels), but at least he was communicating.Happy with the quality of the item - as there was no need for anything more than a stamp to be added - for him to mail them to us

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality boys’ stationery!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality, very cute stationery for grandsons! Tear out pages for Thank yous, etc that are folded to mail, no envelope required.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and easy stationary
reviews.reviewText: All I can say is: he liked this stationary enough to send letters home. It's cute and easy for kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great boy stationary
reviews.reviewText: Came fast and was even better looking than in the picture. My grandson will love it. Want to encourage him to write me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy-to-use boys' stationery, perfect for camp
reviews.reviewText: Cute stationery set. I wanted something boyish, sporty and easy that my son would be more likely to use while in camp, and this fit the bill. Each sheet rips out and then folds up into a self-mailer (no envelope needed).I took one star away because it would have been nice if the letters had more colors on them -- not just the black and white and turquoise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Perfect to send to sleepaway. Easy to rip off.
